results.title: Attack: Andre Agassi and Nick Bollettieri
results.brief_description: A tennis coaching video in ten easy to follow sections designed by top tennis coach Nick Bollettieri, coach to tennis superstars such as Andre Agassi and Monica Seles. Agassi and Bollettieri take the viewer through the various techniques involved in tennis: forehand, backhand, volley, serve, overhead, lob and drop shot.

results.title: Attack of the strange insects from Uranus
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
This mockumentary, depicting the zombie apocalypse, contains a hilarious collection of violence and gore. (Note that some scenes may disturb some viewers).

results.title: Attack of the giant leeches
results.creator_credit: Bernard L Kowalski, Gene Corman, Roger Corman and American International Pictures (AIP)
results.brief_description: After local-moonshine swilling trapper Lem Sawyer (George Cisar) sees a giant creature, people start disappearing. While searching for illegal traps Steve Benton (Ken Clark) and girl friend Nan Greyson (Jan Shepard) find Lem dying with giant sucker wounds on his body. One couple, Liz Walker (Yvette Vickers) and Cal Moulton (Michael Emmett), forced into the water by her enraged husband Dave Walker (Bruno Ve Sota), get taken by the leeches. When police refuse to believe Dave’s story, he hangs himself. Soon after this, two more trappers disappear, and local Game Warden Steve Benton gets involved. He and Nan’s father - Dr Greyson, realize that the people were taken by the leeches and the leeches live in caves under the swamp. Using dynamite, the four missing bodies are discovered, but are the leeches destroyed? Written By Leo Gordon, with music by Alexander Laszlo.

results.title: Attack of the 50ft woman
results.creator_credit: Nathan Hertz, Bernard Woolner and Woolner Productions
results.brief_description: No one believes Nancy Archer has encountered a giant alien from outer space in the desert one night. The local sheriff and her doctor think she is suffering from hallucinations. Her husband, Harry, is openly having an affair and wants Nancy committed to an asylum so he can take her money and enjoy a life of lustful luxury. It soon becomes quite obvious Nancy is telling the truth when she grows into a 50ft woman who soon becomes a towering menace as she seeks out her husband and his lover to get even.

results.title: Attack Force Z
results.brief_description: Hidden on a small Pacific Island is a man with a secret that could end the Second World War and the killer elite Attack Force Z is sent in to get him out… or die in the attempt.

results.title: Attack Force Z
results.brief_description: Tim Burstall directs then-up-and-comers Mel Gibson and Sam Neill in this action-packed Cannes Film Festival selection about the grim realities of World War II, a gritty drama based on actual events.

constellations_other.name: Australia and WW2
constellations_other.description: A constellation exploring representations of Australians during World War 2.

results.description: Tim Burstall directs then-up-and-comers Mel Gibson and Sam Neill in this action-packed Cannes Film Festival selection about the grim realities of World War II, a gritty drama based on actual events. Sent to rescue survivors from the site of a plane crash in the South Pacific, Capt. P.G. Kelly (Gibson) and his elite squad of Australian commandos must keep tabs on a defecting Japanese official who could hold the secret to peace.

results.title: Atsushi Chiba: mechanical engineer
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Faces of Japan”.
Atsushi Chiba is a 30 year old engineer at an auto-parts factory north of Tokyo. This documentary focuses on the technical and social aspects of his working environment and touches on attitudes and aspirations in his family life.

results.title: Atonement
results.creator_credit: Universal Pictures, Relativity Media, Working Title Films, StudioCanal, Jacqueline Durran, Sarah Greenwood, Joe Wright, Paul Webster, Christopher Hampton, Eric Fellner and Tim Bevan
results.headline_credit: France, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2007
results.brief_description: As a 13-year-old, fledgling writer Briony Tallis irrevocably changes the course of several lives when she accuses her older sister’s lover of a crime he did not commit.

constellations_other.name: The war effort on film
constellations_other.description: Newsreel and documentaries were used as propaganda for the war effort by all sides during WWII, many of them made by major film studios, directors and actors.

results.title: Atonement
results.creator_credit: Michael McKennirey, George Pearson, Canadian Wildlife Service and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: Ten million buffalo once roamed the plains of North America but now, only a few carefully protected herds remain. The carrier pigeon, the whooping crane and other species have fallen prey to the greatest predator, man. This program shows efforts by wildlife specialists to preserve and nurture the creatures that remain in the wilderness areas. Scenes rarely photographed are included in this spellbinding documentary.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Michael McKennirey, George Pearson, Canadian Wildlife Service and National Film Board of Canada
